h2_title: Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Non-White (Round Two)
content: In addition to the previously discussed moves Non-White utilized in your last encounter, he'll get even more aggressive with sneaky frost attacks, making using the Fiery Gourd a very smart investment to keep from getting chilled, or you can use the Ring of Fire to get some breathing room and recover.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Valley_of_Ecstasy_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Valley of Ecstasy Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Non-White (Round Two)'.
The content is as follows:
In addition to the previously discussed moves Non-White utilized in your last encounter, he'll get even more aggressive with sneaky frost attacks, making using the Fiery Gourd a very smart investment to keep from getting chilled, or you can use the Ring of Fire to get some breathing room and recover.
